entry.title: Apple Vision Pro Impressions!
entry.quote: I tried Apple's first ever spatial computing device, a $3500 VR headset. These are my honest thoughts.

entry.title: First impressions: Yes, Apple Vision Pro works and yes, it’s good
entry.quote: A lot of completely new and original hardware. Everywhere you look here there’s a new idea, a new technology or a new implementation

entry.title: Apple Vision
entry.quote: Vision is a description of a product, it is an aspiration for a use case, and it is a critique on the sort of society we are building, behind Apple’s leadership more than anyone else.

entry.title: From “Heavy Purchasers” of Pregnancy Tests to the Depression-Prone: We Found 650,000 Ways Advertisers Label You
entry.quote: But the exposure of a collection of audience segments this size offers consumers an unusual look at how they and their families are packaged, described, and categorized by ad companies.
